mapper.select: select bank_code cd, bank_nm nm from tb_bank order by bank_code asc
select a.store_id cd, a.business_nm nm from tb_store a inner join tb_store_role b on a.store_id = b.store_id and b.role_id = '1002' order by a.created_datetime

select a.store_id cd, a.business_nm nm from tb_store a inner join tb_store_role b on a.store_id = b.store_id and b.role_id = '1003'
and a.high_store_id = #{cd}

select a.store_id cd, a.business_nm nm from tb_store a inner join tb_store_role b on a.store_id = b.store_id and b.role_id = '1004'
and a.high_store_id = #{cd}
select b.code_nm cd, b.code_detail nm from tb_code a inner join tb_code b on a.code_id = b.high_code_id order by b.no asc, b.code_id asc
select store_id cd, business_nm nm from tb_store where high_store_id = #{cd} order by created_datetime
select cardcode cd, cardname nm from tb_card_code
select count(*) cnt from tb_store a inner join tb_store_role b on a.store_id = b.store_id and b.role_id = '1004' where a.store_id = #{store_id}
select max(a.cpid) cpid from tb_store a inner join tb_store_role b on a.store_id = b.store_id and b.role_id = '1004' where a.store_id = #{store_id}
